title: Stream: Hudson Mohawke – Satin Panthers
body:
**Hudson Mohawke** has just released his new EP, _Satin Panthers_, for streaming online.

It’s a dubstep romp, if that’s attractive to you, hit play below. The EP comes out on **Warp** on the 1st of August.

01 – Octan  
02 – Thunder Bay  
03 – Cbat  
04 – All Your Love  
05 – Thank You
